title: Philippe Sloksnath
text:
# Hello, fellow traveler.
I am a Research and Teaching Assistant at the  Department of Communication and Media Research  at University of Zurich, in the Media Psychology & Methods Division. My research is situated in Communication Science, Psychology and Human-Computer Interaction, with a particular focus AI-based persuasion, misinformation, and media effects. I care about statistical inference, and transparent and reproducible research practices. Always happy to chat, so feel free to reach out!
